description.@en: I lost my hand in a pretty nasty fight. As you can see, however, with a combination of straps, wooden digits and other mechanics, I still have use of it.

system.notes: Grievous Injuries must undergo a successful Perform Surgery within twenty-four hours of suffering it, or else a character gains its related Permanent Injury.

effect.@en: You must spend a Coin to attack with a twohanded melee weapon.
